WESTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
SARDINIA.
DNC 08
1. HAZARDOUS OPERATIONS 0630Z TO 1630Z DAILY
   08 THRU 12, 15 THRU 19, 22 THRU 26 FEB AND
   01 THRU 04 MAR IN AREA BOUND BY
   39-42.8N 008-26.8E, 39-42.8N 008-23.2E,
   39-44.3N 008-22.5E, 39-46.0N 008-22.7E,
   39-47.5N 008-23.8E, 39-48.5N 008-25.2E,
   39-49.0N 008-28.0E, 39-48.1N 008-30.0E.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 041730Z MAR 21.
